derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from French, from Greek khrōma 'colour' (because of the brilliant colours of chromium compounds)

entry.def: Chrome is metal plated with chromium.

means.word_mean: 1. another word for chromium when it is used in dyes or pigments

list.explanation: 光秃秃的脑袋，秃顶男子

example.en: The guy with the chrome-dome suddenly grasped his chest and made a face.
example.zh: 那个秃顶的家伙突然抓住胸口，做了个鬼脸。
嗨，秃子，你档住我的视线了!
